        public IUser start(IUser user)
        Start the server by setting the necessary RMI system parameters, starting the security manager, locating the local Registry and binding an instance of the user to it. Also starts the class file server to enable remote dynamic class loading.
        Parameters:
        username -
        ip -
        Returns:
        successful or not
